data.text: @Govgg It would be very helpful to have more frequent updates on known positive cases. Weekly is not enough to risk assess

@Govgg It's going to take more than this. I have had to ask for hand sanitizer in almost every building that I have been into, and most times I am the only person wearing a mask. As for distancing in queues, if I leave a 2m space somebody steps into it. I've stopped going to shops.
@Govgg It’s just not happening - I know of 4 families that sent their children to school while the children were still showing positive tests. 🤷🏻‍♂️🙈
2/ COVID-19 has not gone away and we are trying to ensure essential services do not become significantly impacted as a result of COVID-related staff absences.
